items.sentence: I want you to mow the lawn right after breakfast.
I wanted Tom to stay longer, but he had to leave.
I knew if I let Tom leave, he\'d never come back.
I know Tom isn\'t going to pay me for doing this.
When the boss finds out, heads are going to roll.
When we started out, we only had three employees.
I wish I could figure out how to beat the system.
Tom looked grouchy, so Mary didn\'t approach him.
There is little, if any, hope of his being alive.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary and John are fighting.
